Package view.console

Class ConsoleInGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.console.ConsoleInGame
  • public class ConsoleInGame
extends java.lang.Object
    ConsoleInGame draws on the console the game grid's, the information about the game and the result
    Author:
    Godet Louis-Xavier

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected char[] ALPHABET_ABSCISSA
      This attribute is a correspondance table where the letters are ordered in alphabetical order and the index in this tab is the position on the grid.
      private int GRID_HEIGHT_WIDTH
      The size of the grid (11*11)
      private SquareGrid[][] gridToDisplay
      The game's grid to display

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void displayAsks()
      Displays the option in game

      Displays the list of moves according to the selected square
      java.lang.String displayPawn​(SquareGrid square)
      Displays a graphic representation of the pawn according to it type (if there is a pawn in the square)

    • Field Detail

      • GRID_HEIGHT_WIDTH

        private final int GRID_HEIGHT_WIDTH
        The size of the grid (11*11)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALPHABET_ABSCISSA

        protected final char[] ALPHABET_ABSCISSA
        This attribute is a correspondance table where the letters are ordered in alphabetical order and the index in this tab is the position on the grid. It is use to translate the letter input by the human player to a number

      • gridToDisplay

        private SquareGrid[][] gridToDisplay
        The game's grid to display
